title: Bellows Surgery Part 2
body:
I had this piece which used to hold the slidy thing bars at the back of the bellows - this got epoxied back onto the bellows on top of the strip of aluminium that was added. 

Some filing, sanding and painting later, the arca swiss plate is bolted on to the bottom, the bellows are reassembled and here is where it is at now (you can see the bit that was added in the second photo):
